trans-unit.source: Implements an event provider that maps ASP.NET health-monitoring events to Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) events.
trans-unit.target: 實作事件提供者，將 ASP.NET 健康監視事件對應至 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) 事件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management> namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management>命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。

trans-unit.source: It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events.
trans-unit.target: 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses this class to map health-monitoring events to WMI events.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會使用這個類別對應至 WMI 事件的健全狀況監視的事件。

trans-unit.source: To enable the delivery of ASP.NET health-monitoring events to the WMI subsystem, you must configure the <xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider> class by adding the appropriate settings in the `<healthMonitoring>` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用 ASP.NET 健康監視事件傳遞至 WMI 子系統，您必須設定<xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider>藉由新增適當的設定中的類別`<healthMonitoring>`組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: The information contained in the Aspnet.mof file describes the parameters of the WMI events raised when ASP.NET health-monitoring events are routed to the <xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider> class and mapped into WMI events.
trans-unit.target: Aspnet.mof 檔案中包含的資訊說明 ASP.NET 健康監視的事件會路由到時所引發的 WMI 事件的參數<xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider>類別並對應到 WMI 事件。

trans-unit.source: The Aspnet.mof file is stored in the .NET Framework build directory, for example %windir%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*BuildNumber*.
trans-unit.target: Aspnet.mof 檔案會儲存在.NET Framework 組建目錄，例如 %windir%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*BuildNumber*。

trans-unit.source: For more information about reporting health-monitoring events as WMI events, see [NIB: Using WMI to Deliver ASP.NET Health Monitoring Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e57fea2f-610f-4432-9dd6-dd10a6c5bd10).
trans-unit.target: 如需報告健康狀態監控事件做為 WMI 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用 WMI 來傳遞 ASP.NET 健康監視事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e57fea2f-610f-4432-9dd6-dd10a6c5bd10)。

trans-unit.source: In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `<healthMonitoring>` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`<healthMonitoring>`組態區段。

trans-unit.source: You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。

trans-unit.source: For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c).
trans-unit.target: 如需建立自訂提供者的範例，請參閱[How to： 實作健全狀況監視自訂提供者範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a consumer of WMI events issued by ASP.NET health monitoring as a result of Web-application health events.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何建立 ASP.NET Web 應用程式健全狀況事件監視的健全狀況所發出的 WMI 事件的取用者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider> class and the health event types to monitor are already configured by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider>類別和監視的健全狀況事件型別已依預設設定。

trans-unit.source: The only thing you need to do is to define the rule for all the health events.
trans-unit.target: 唯一要做為定義所有健全狀況事件的規則。

trans-unit.source: Remember that the health events are not dispatched to the <xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider> provider by default.
trans-unit.target: 請記住健全狀況事件，不會發送給<xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider>預設提供者。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a configuration file excerpt that shows a `<healthMonitoring>` configuration section that enables ASP.NET to use the <xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider> provider to process all health-monitoring events.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示組態檔摘錄`<healthMonitoring>`組態區段可讓 ASP.NET 使用<xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider>處理所有健全狀況監視事件提供者。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視系統會在內部使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: You will never use it to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Management.TraceWebEventProvider> class, but you can call this constructor when you implement your own provider type that inherits from this class.
trans-unit.target: 您永遠不會使用它來建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Management.TraceWebEventProvider>類別，但您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己的提供者類型繼承自這個類別時。

trans-unit.source: Removes all events from the provider's buffer.
trans-unit.target: 從提供者的緩衝區中移除所有事件。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, all the events in the provider's buffer are immediately removed, regardless of how much time has elapsed since the last write or how many events are in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法呼叫時，所有的提供者緩衝區中的事件會立即遭到移除，不論自上次經過多少時間寫入或多少事件是在緩衝區中。

trans-unit.source: The time of the last write is reset to the time of the flushing action.
trans-unit.target: 清除動作的時間會重設上次寫入時間。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method when the buffering mechanism is not enabled has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用緩衝機制時，呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The name used in the configuration file to identify this provider.
trans-unit.target: 在組態檔中用來識別這個提供者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> object that specifies the attributes assigned for this provider in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> 物件，指定組態檔中指派給這個提供者的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the initial values for this object.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個物件的初始值。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls the <xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider.Initialize%2A> method after calling the <xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 呼叫<xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider.Initialize%2A>方法之後呼叫<xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to initialize the <xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider> class with the configuration settings and name specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法呼叫以初始化<xref:System.Web.Management.WmiWebEventProvider>類別的組態設定和組態檔中指定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent" /> object to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Processes the event passed to the provider.
trans-unit.target: 處理傳遞給提供者的事件。

trans-unit.source: This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start the processing of the event.
trans-unit.target: 這是 ASP.NET 健康監視呼叫來啟動處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The event could not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 無法引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.
trans-unit.target: 執行與關閉提供者關聯的工作。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls the <xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider.Shutdown%2A> method when the application domain that hosts the Web application terminates.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 呼叫<xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider.Shutdown%2A>應用程式定義域中裝載 Web 應用程式終止時的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully.
trans-unit.target: 方法會呼叫以執行工作，可讓應用程式正常結束。
